Responsible for business development and creating an outstanding experience for both our clients and consultants. Bringing over 20 years of experience working with clients to understand their strategic priorities and working with them to structure a Talent Acquisition strategy to help meet the growing demand for a high caliber workforce.Xtreme Consulting is a rapidly growing, nationally recognized technology consulting and professional services firm. We partner with companies of all sizes to achieve their business objectives in innovative ways. Our offerings include a wide-range of business and IT consulting solutions, managed services, and staff augmentation.At Xtreme, people come first – in every aspect of the business. We focus on creating long-term relationships with our clients that are transparent, honest, and responsible. And we work hard to ensure the proper support, development, and satisfaction of Xtreme consultants; offering a benefits package that is rarely matched in the industry and fostering a professional, flexible, and fun company culture. We have repeatedly been honored as one of Inc. 5000’s Fastest-Growing Private Companies in America, one of the Puget Sound Business Journal’s Top Corporate Philanthropists, and one of Puget Sound Business Journal’s Washington’s Best Workplaces. Xtreme services organizations worldwide through our office locations in Kirkland, WA (HQ), Redmond, WA, Portland, OR, Mountain View, CA, Phoenix, AZ, Boise, ID, Dallas, TX, Fargo, ND, Charlotte, NC, Fort Lauderdale, FL, and Dubai, UAE.

Responsible for establishing a local presence in the Southwest focused on markets where US Tech had been supporting clients remotely. Successful in establishing strong relationships within the strategic client both in Phoenix and Los Angeles, securing extensions on existing consulting engagements and identifying new opportunities to support critical projects. Also provided support and mentoring to other Business Development Managers in other markets and participated in weekly strategy discussions with the national business development team.

Responsible for providing leadership to the Arizona office, which included the management of all activities related to the P&L, business development, client satisfaction, negotiating all new master service agreements and updated amendments, along with consultant satisfaction and all fulfillment and recruiting operations.  Also provide support around ongoing consultant care, payroll processing, and all marketing activities.  Also, a part of the Strategic Development team at a corporate level, that met a couple of times a year to review and set the strategic direction of the company and align critical strategic goals.

Responsible for managing a book of business around strategic clients, while at the same time developing a pipeline of new clients and maintaining a qualified list of target accounts.  Developing and implementing the strategy to move the target accounts forward in the sales process to turn them into a billable client or remove them from our focus.  Participate in developing and implementing the branch strategy around client and consultant satisfaction and retention.  Additional responsibilities include providing support on a corporate project to formalize and implement best practices around our sales strategy and to also mentor new or more junior Client Managers.

Responsible for developing and implementing a marketing plan, which included identification of target customers, strategy for winning their business, goals and objectives, and keys for measuring success.  Required discipline to work independently but also to collaborate with a team.  Over 70% of time spent in direct communication with clients or potential clients.  Establishing and developing relationships was critical to our success.

Responsible for developing and implementing a pursuit strategy focused on new business development. Focus for business development was on both staffing and project solution opportunities. Responsibilities included the management of all customer relationships, acting as the liaison with the recruiting and delivery teams to ensure the customers complete satisfaction.  Additional responsibilities included mentoring and working with other divisions on joint sales pursuits. Worked closely with the Area Director and Regional VP to develop our annual sales/marketing plan for the branch, which included revenue forecasting.

Responsible for developing a strategy to promote and sell our services, manage day to day sales activity, and work closely with executive management to plan for growth and determine new business opportunities.  This included overall responsibility for each client relationship and their satisfaction with the service we provided.

Responsible for multimillion dollar quota generated from selling staffing and project solutions to assigned major accounts, and developing new business in existing and new clients.  Responsible for overall customer relationship management in all areas of sales and delivery of service.  Additional responsibilities included mentoring junior Account Executives, working as a liaison with other divisions, and assisting on various nationwide corporate projects.  Worked closely with the Branch Manager, Operations Manager, and Practice Directors to develop ongoing strategy for anticipating and fulfilling customer expectations.

Responsible for growing the sales volume from assigned major accounts and developing new clients.  Acted as a consultant to my existing and potential clients, advising them on the best way to address their training needs.  Also achieved Microsoft Sales Specialist Certification.

Responsible for supporting all aspects of new business development within a specified territory.  Worked closely with senior sales representatives located in the territory, managed proposals, contracts, and fulfillment activities.

I have had the fortune to work with Allan twice in the last decade, the first time I inherited him and the second time I specifically sought him out.  Allan epitomizes all that you look for in a sales professional and a colleague.  He is professional, knowledgeable, and reliable on a foundation of integrity and honesty.  His motivations are derived directly from his ongoing desire to do what is "right".  Whether he is working with a client, a colleague or one of his many philanthropic interests - he puts himself second to all others.  I have nothing but the utmost respect for Allan and while we are currently working together, I would immediately seek him out a third time if the opportunity to do so existed.

summary: Allan has a proven record of helping organizations identify and leverage their strengths to create a loyal customer base, while also keeping a focus on new business development.  He has been actively involved in developing the strategic direction along with the plan to implement the strategy and reach the goals, providing leadership and mentoring during the process.  Allan is known for creating strong client relationships, understanding his clients critical business objectives, providing consultative support and consistently delivering tailored solutions to help his clients reach their goals.Specialties: Consultative Business Development, Relationship Management, Customized Project Services, Contingent Workforce Solutions, and Creative Problem Solving

title: Sr. Business Development Director
